title: BRIEF-Aarti Drugs To Expand In Antiinflammatory Therapeutic Category This FY

BRIEF-Aarti Drugs To Expand In Antiinflammatory Therapeutic Category This FY

Stock Markets 33 minutes ago (Oct 24, 2019 13:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Aarti Drugs To Expand In Antiinflammatory Therapeutic Category This FY Oct 24 (Reuters) - Aarti Drugs Ltd : * BROWN FIELD CAPEX WOULD BE DONE IN CURRENT FY TO EXPAND FEW CAPACITIES IN ANTIINFLAMMATORY THERAPEUTIC CATEGORY * EXPORTS MARKETS ARE SLOWLY OPENING UP FOR FORMULATION DIVISION AND IT WILL DRIVE THE MARGINS FOR THAT DIVISION
